item.title: If i get killed by an npc
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:



That

[code=java]public void applyDead() {   
        c.respawnTimer = 10;
        c.isDead = false;
        if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
            //c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
            c.killerId = findKiller();
            Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
            if(o != null) {
                if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){
                
                if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
				if(o.inWild() || o.PkBox()){
 o.pkPoints += 5;
o.sendMessage("You have recieved 5 pk points for defeating " +Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!");
c.sendMessage("Oh dear, you have died");
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

That

[code=java]public void applyDead() {
c.respawnTimer = 10;
c.isDead = false;
if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
//c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
c.killerId = findKiller();
Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
if(o != null) {
if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){

            if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
			if(o.inWild() || o.PkBox()){

o.pkPoints += 5;
o.sendMessage(“You have recieved 5 pk points for defeating " +Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+”!");
c.sendMessage(“Oh dear, you have died”);
}
}
}
}
}[/code]

item.title: If i get killed by an npc
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

           Change [code=java]if (c.killerId != c.playerId)[/code]

to

To make a specific area be recognized as pkBox

search for this in player.java

[code=java]

public boolean inFightCaves()
{
return absX >= 2360 && absX <= 2445 && absY >= 5045 && absY <= 5125;
}[/code]
Under it add this and replace with your co-ordinates
public boolean inPkBox() { return absX >= 2737 && absX <= 4882 && absY >= 2707 && absY <= 4915; }

Read full topic

item.source: If i get killed by an npc

item.title: If i get killed by an npc
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){ }
Is the only thing that I see that deals with NPC’s however, it’s enclosed in brackets with nothing in them, so it’s a pointless if-statement. I’m assuming that it was coded so that for any reason if you die, you receive points (which was the case). So I suggest in the if-statement

if (c.killerId != c.playerId) o.sendMessage("You have defeated "+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+"!"); c.pkPoints += 5; }

Try that, otherwise, I’m off to bed, so I won’t be able to help anymore.

Read full topic

c.respawnTimer = 10;

if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
//c.killerId = c.getCombat().getKillerId(c.playerId);
c.killerId = findKiller();
Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
if(o != null) {
if(!(c.npcIndex > 0) && c.inPits == false){
}
if (c.killerId != c.playerId)
o.sendMessage(“You have defeated “+Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName)+”!”);
// if(!c.inWild() || !c.inFunPk()){

item.title: If i get killed by an npc
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

Simply search your source files for (variableName) += 5; or (variableName) = (variableName) + 5;
Rather simple way to find the method at which it adds 5 pk points when you get defeated by an NPC.
